title: Camera Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Camera screen is shown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera screen displays carousel of possible lens to apply

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Carousel of lens is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is able to swipe back and forth through carousel and apply various lens

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on flip camera face
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera flips to opposite state (front or back facing)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera Tab is closed and user it returned to Today Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on x below applied lens
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to first lens in carousel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Camera Icon in bottom navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera Tab is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on system hardware back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to Today Tab

title: Camera - Photos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
AND a Snap Lens is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User applies a lens and taps on the lens again to take a photo
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera Preview Screen is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Camera Preview Screen is presented
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User has options to save or share or close preview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects "save" option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Preview screen's photo is saved once to phone (verify by viewing in photo app)

--Android Only--
THEN "save" option is disabled (icon changes and text changes to "saved")

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects "shared" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System share sheet is displayed for preview photo with file type JPEG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects method to share and completes sharing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Shared photo can be viewed via method selected (text, email, etc.)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to main Camera Screen

title: Camera - Videos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
AND a Snap Lens is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User applies a lens and holds down on the lens and takes a video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera Preview Screen is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Camera Preview Screen is presented
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User has options to save or share or close preview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects "save" option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Preview screen's video is saved once to phone (verify by viewing in photo app) 

-- Android Only ----
THEN "save" option is disabled (icon changes and text changes to "saved")

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects "shared" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System share sheet is displayed for preview video with file type MP4

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects method to share and completes sharing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Shared video can be viewed via method selected (text, email, etc.)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to main Camera Screen

title: Camera - Lens with Vendor Data
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
AND a Snap Lens is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects Launch Data Test lens
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Lens is applied and vendor data is displayed

title: Camera Deeplink
custom_preconds: User has Ballpark App installed and has logged in but does not have the app currently running

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on "ballpark://camera" in Slack window
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ballpark app is opened and the Camera Tab is displayed

title: Initial Install Allowing All Permissions
custom_preconds: User has logged into Ballpark App and is on Home Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is taken to Camera Screen and a dialog is present which describes why additional permissions are required with an option to cancel or continue

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on cancel options 
AND User dismisses the camera
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is taken back to More Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'Foul Ball' dialog is displayed 
AND dialog displays 'Ballpark requires Camera access to use MLB filters for photos and video.'
AND dialog presents user with option to cancel or Go to Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Go to Settings option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System prompt to allow app to use camera (and microphone) is presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on allow app to access and camera 
AND User returns to BP app
AND User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera screen is presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User selects any lens
AND User and holds down and records video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera preview screen is presented and video has audio

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to More Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera screen is presented without any dialogs displayed

title: Initial Install Denying Permissions
custom_preconds: User has logged into Ballpark App and is on Home Tab and has not yet navigated to More Tab > Photo Creator

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is taken to Camera Screen and a dialog is present which describes why additional permissions are required with an option to cancel or continue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on continue option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System prompt to allow app to take pictures and record video is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on deny app to take pictures and record video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Dialog is presented which describes can not use camera tab and give options to cancel or go to settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on cancel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to tab which they were on previously

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is taken to Camera Screen and a dialog is present which describes why additional permissions are required with an option to cancel or continue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on continue option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System prompt to allow app to take pictures and record video is presented including option to Deny & don't ask again

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on deny app and don't ask again to take pictures and record video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Dialog is presented which describes can not use camera tab and give options to cancel or go to settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on cancel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to tab which they were on previously

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Dialog is presented which describes can not use camera tab and give options to cancel or go to settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on continue option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Dialog is presented which describes can not use camera tab and give options to cancel or go to settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on go to settings options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System settings page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User hits back key
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Dialog is presented which describes can not use camera tab and give options to cancel or go to settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on go to settings options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System settings page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User enables camera permission and hits back key to return to Ballpark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System prompt to allow app access to files is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on deny app to access files
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Dialog is presented which describes can not use camera tab and give options to cancel or go to settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on go to settings options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System settings page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User enables storage permission and hits back key to return to Ballpark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN System prompt to allow app to record audio is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on deny app ability to record audio
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Camera screen is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on applied lens to take photo
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN camera preview screen is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on preview close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN camera screen is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects the Mask Sound Reactive lens (two heads in the icon) and holds down and records video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN camera preview screen is displayed but no audio is recorded

title: Allow All Permissions Prior to App Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
*** Android Only ***
* Install Ballpark
* Enable permissions for (Camera, Microphone, storage)
* Open the app & login

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on Camera Tab from Today Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is not prompted for allowing permissions
